Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Skiing is awesome with a 24" base of natural snow and daily power tilling.  All trails are open.  Save $20 on race registration by registering online at SKIREG.com by 10 pm tonight!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run was firm and fast this afternoon as there had been a lot of skiers on the course.  When I arrived around 4 pm the parking lot was jammed and there were a lot of skiers on the trail.  Conditions should remain very good with the potential snow later tonight and colder temps in the forecast.    Great job by the Huron Meadows crew!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 chairlifts, conveyor and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked later this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It's nuking snow at Nub's this morning. Lake effect bands are dropping snow rapidly and the slopes are covered in a powder blanket. The majority of snow fell after grooming this morning. The grooming crew is going out a second time to put lines down on the beginner terrain and less steep runs. Expect powder on the expert terrain and much of the intermediate runs. If you prefer groomers head to Pintail Peak as that will be groomed last. The soup of the day is sweet and sour sweet potato with ham. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and the espresso bar. Lifts will turn from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Grab the wide skis and enjoy an epic MLK jr. Holiday at Nub's Nob.
